title: Locate
text: Locate the given place value and mark it or highlight it.

title: Digits to the Right
text: Underline the value to the right of the highlighted or marked value.

title: Value
text: Is this value greater than or equal to 5?

title: Add
text: If the underlined digit is not greater than or equal to $$5$$, we will not need to add one to the digit in the given place value.

title: Remove
text: Cut off everything to the right of the marked value if the underlined value is less than five.
